revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Po Town |image = [[File:Po Town.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Po Town. |tokens = 1,075,000 |location = North of Route 17 }}
<!--T:2--> '''Po Town''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 15,340,576 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
